column5: Nice knife! My latest knifes were hand made with wood handles, maple and black walnut, from my own back yard.
Sweet, post a pic. I used to hollow out a piece of antler, then epoxy it to the tang for my own customs.
Awsome steel too, S30V holds an edge just wickedly....  Burt
Ya, I've been a knife-o-holic for years! You get what you pay for. I'm liking SOG blades too, my Vulcan folder & Gov-Tac bowie.  http://www.newgraham.com/detail.aspx?ID=44269
thats not a knife this is a knife.sweet blade you got there.
Life's too short, to carry an ugly knife!  http://www.avrion.com.au/images/Crocodile-Dundee.jpg
